arts.ttl: Griezmann helps Atletico sweep aside Slovan Bratislava
arts.sum: Watch the highlights as Atletico Madrid comfortably beat Slovan Bratislava with help from star strike partnership Julian Alvarez and Antoine Griezmann.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone insists “dreaming big is dreaming about the next game” after Slovan Bratislava win
arts.sum: Diego Simeone spoke to the press following the UEFA Champions League victory over ŠK Slovan Bratislava, with a 3-1 win against coach Vladimir Weiss and his players, with the rival reflecting post-match that, “ Atlético Madrid has a great team with a great player in Griezmann, they deserve to win the Champions League”. Simeone went on to add, “we know that it is a league with Real Madrid and Barcelona, the best teams in Europe, in the cup you will surely cross them if you keep advancing, in an important moment in the Champions League too, in the league we always compete against them and they are the best.

arts.ttl: Antoine Griezmann joins Lionel Messi & Mo Salah in exclusive club with Atlético brace
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid star Antoine Griezmann on Wednesday evening etched his name into an altogether exclusive club on the continent. This comes owing to his exploits in Atlético’s meeting with Slovan…

arts.ttl: Alvarez scores for Atletico Madrid in Champions League win and shows what Man City is missing
arts.sum: With a brilliant curling finish, Julian Alvarez helped Atletico Madrid beat Slovan Bratislava 3-1 in the Champions League on Wednesday and provided a timely reminder of what Manchester City is missing on a big night for the ailing English champions. City, with just one win in its last nine matches in all competitions, visits Juventus later Wednesday and is far from guaranteed to advance in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: EXCLUSIVE: Premier League clubs monitor Atletico Madrid veteran
arts.sum: A number of Premier League clubs are monitoring Atletico Madrid veteran Reinildo as an option for next year, FootballTransfers can reveal. The Mozambique player has featued in 18 La Liga matches this season for Atletico, starting in seven of those games.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone: “Hard work is reflected in Giuliano, Galán & Lenglet”
arts.sum: Donning an uncharacteristic blue suit and white shirt, Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke to the media on Tuesday evening ahead of the UEFA Champions League tie against ŠK Slavan Bratislava. When asked about the distribution of game time across the squad and his rotation policy, Simeone sent a clear message to his players.

arts.ttl: Man United could replace Dan Ashworth with transfer guru who signed Ballon d’Or winner
arts.sum: Manchester United are reportedly looking at Atletico Madrid director Andrea Berta as a candidate to replace Dan Ashworth following his exit from Old Trafford. The Red Devils have just decided to part ways with Ashworth after a poor performance in the summer transfer window, with the former Newcastle and Brighton director struggling to replicate his […] The post Man United could replace Dan Ashworth with transfer guru who signed Ballon d’Or winner appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Preview: Atletico Madrid vs. Slovan Bratislava - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Champions League clash between Atletico Madrid and Slovan Bratislava, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
